JoyconLib

Class Joycon

  • java.lang.Object
    • JoyconLib.Joycon
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LeftJoycon, RightJoycon

    public abstract class Joycon
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract Joycon Class. Contains methods to initialize a joystick and do certain things when it disconnects or when an input is reported
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    lakshbhambhani

    • Constructor Detail

      • Joycon

        public Joycon(short joyconId)
        Constructor of the Joycon.

        To specify a correct identifier just use JoyconConstant.JOYCON_LEFT to use the left Joycon or JoyconConstant.JOYCON_RIGHT

        Parameters:
        joyconId - Identifier of the joycon you'll use

        Parameters:

        public void setListener(JoyconListener li)
        Set the listener of the Joycon to handle his input
        Parameters:
        li - The listener, specify null to remove it

      • close

        public boolean close()
        Close the connection with the Joycon
        Returns:
        True or false if closed correctly

      • testConnection

        public void testConnection(short joyconId)
        Tests if the joycon is still connected and updated isConnected based on that

      • updateValues

        public abstract void updateValues(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> map)
        Abstract Method used to update the values of the buttons or joystick when an input is reported
        Parameters:
        map - The map containing the id of the button and isPressed

      • onInputReportDoThis

        public abstract void onInputReportDoThis(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> map)
        This method can be used to do something user-specific when an input is reported. Such as user wanting to log what inputs are reported
        Parameters:
        map - The map containing the id of the button and isPressed

      • isButtonPressed

        public boolean isButtonPressed(JoyconButton button)
        Used to check if a certain button is pressed
        Parameters:
        button - The button that has to be checked if it is pressed
        Returns:
        boolean isPressed - True if it is pressed
